GSD.description:
Bluetooth: use memset avoid memory leaks

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.3 by commit d588c183a971b85c775ad66da563ee6e8bc8158f. For more details please see the references link.
